name: npm-frontend-boilerplate
description: A frontend project boilerplate bundling with NPM scripts. Includes browserify, browser-sync, scss, uglify-js and imagemin.

scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:js: npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:images
scripts.watch: parallelshell "npm run serve" "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:js"
scripts.postinstall: mkdirp dist/css dist/js dist/images && npm run build:all

author: Mikhail Kononenko aka vbifonix
